casebody.data:
Linda E. SHOFFNER, Employee
v.
WAL-MART STORES, INC., Employer and
INSURANCE COMPANY OF THE STATE OF PENNSYLVANIA, Carrier. No. 569P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2005. Jeffrey T. Linder, Raleigh, for Wal-Mart and Insurance of Pa. Kathleen G. Sumner, Greensboro, for Shoffner.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of November 2004 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of April 2005."
